Five Useful Ideas

About Blog

Welcome!

This website documents me rediscovering simple and sustainable technologies that enable online freedom, privacy rights, and free & open access to information and knowledge.

Documenting my journey for a better web with these ideas,

  • Open-source
  • Privacy-first
  • Cross-platform
  • Eco-friendly
  • Inclusive community

Colophon

This site has been validated to be HTML5 safe. Please see why it is important to validate here, here and here.

This site has been built to ensure low load times, it is based on the John Doe Template and is hugely inspired by 10kb Club's ideas of a quicker, simpler web.
